summary: Scooby-Doo and Shaggy must go into the underworld ruled by the Goblin King in order to stop a mortal named The Amazing Krudsky who wants power and is a threat to their pals, Fred, Velma and Daphne.
cast: Frank Welker|Casey Kasem|Grey Griffin|Mindy Cohn|Wayne Knight|Wallace Shawn|Hayden Panettiere|Tim Curry|Jim Belushi|Larry Joe Campbell|Lauren Bacall|Jay Leno|Thom Adcox-Hernandez|Russi Taylor
keywords: 2000s|underworld|goblin king|animal character name in title|scooby doo character
title: Scooby-Doo and the Goblin King
